Interface ArgumentInjectionPoint<B,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    B - The declaring bean type
    T - The argument type
    All Superinterfaces:

    public interface ArgumentInjectionPoint<B,T>
extends InjectionPoint<B>
    An injection point for a method or constructor argument.
